discussion.comment: Should feature-specific augmentations of the owner table be editable while the row is active or should changes require disabling the owner row. Based on unintended consequences of disabling a row along with perhaps a desire to allow some administrators to configure feature-specific details but not deleting an owner, the current draft has assumed that changes can be made while an owner is active.
